project_descr: The programme responds to the need to immediately stabilize communities across Borno, Yobe and Adamawa Staes that were devastated by the Boko Haram insurgency.

outputs.output_descr: The project responds to the need to immediately stabilize communities across Borno, Yobe and Adamawa States of Nigeria which were devastated by the Boko Haram insurgency through the provision of support in 4 inter-related areas.
